trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STATSTG?displayProperty=fullName> instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.STATSTG?displayProperty=fullName>改為。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `STATSTG` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`STATSTG`在 MSDN library 的 com 子資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the last access time for this storage, stream or byte array
trans-unit.target: 指出此儲存、 資料流或位元組陣列上次存取時間

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `STATSTG` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`STATSTG`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size in bytes of the stream or byte array.
trans-unit.target: 指定的大小，以位元組為單位的資料流或位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `STATSTG` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`STATSTG`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the class identifier for the storage object.
trans-unit.target: 指出儲存物件的類別識別項。

trans-unit.source: Initialized to `CLSID_NULL` for new storage objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化為`CLSID_NULL`針對新儲存物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `STATSTG` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`STATSTG`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the creation time for this storage, stream, or byte array.
trans-unit.target: 表示此儲存、 資料流或位元組陣列的建立時間。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `STATSTG` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`STATSTG`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the types of region locking supported by the stream or byte array.
trans-unit.target: 指出資料流或位元組陣列支援的區域鎖定類型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `STATSTG` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`STATSTG`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the access mode that was specified when the object was opened.
trans-unit.target: 指出已開啟時指定的物件的存取模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `STATSTG` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`STATSTG`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the current state bits of the storage object (the value most recently set by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IStorage::SetStateBits" name="IStorage::SetStateBits" href=""></xref> method).
trans-unit.target: 指出目前的儲存物件的狀態位元 (最近所設定的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_IStorage::SetStateBits" name="IStorage::SetStateBits" href=""></xref>方法)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `STATSTG` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`STATSTG`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the last modification time for this storage, stream, or byte array.
trans-unit.target: 表示此儲存、 資料流或位元組陣列上次修改的時間。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `STATSTG` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`STATSTG`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a null-terminated string containing the name of the object described by this structure.
trans-unit.target: 以 null 終止的字串，包含這個結構描述物件名稱的指標。

trans-unit.target: 保留供將來使用。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of storage object which is one of the values from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_STGTY" name="STGTY" href=""></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 指出這是其中一個值的儲存物件的類型從<xref uid="langword_csharp_STGTY" name="STGTY" href=""></xref>列舉型別。
